title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2054.7 - Minority- and women-owned businesses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2054.7 - Minority- and women-owned businesses

State Regulations

It is the corporation's policy to enhance opportunities for
minority- and women-owned business enterprises to serve as outside contractors. Those areas or types of procurement contracts for which minority- and
women-owned business enterprises may best submit proposals include, but are not
limited to, contracts for goods or personal services for hotel and buildings
operations, construction, design, construction management, repair and
cleaning. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2054.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
